divs: sighting details this is ben woods and we took another trip out to where we collected the photograph for mufon report #17607 submitted june 22nd. the photograph was posted on teh website i use to post research results during correspondence with interested ufo hunters and trackers at http:\\www.secretetsaucers.com we were able to collect an additional photograph this morning and have included it here with the report. our camera picked up the saucer at 5:40am at our position 35 miles south of las vegas near the lake mead national recreational area. this is area is listed as a frequently visited location for ufos and extraterrestrials(lake mead, hoover dam, grand canyon, good desert). we had gone out on this particular morning for casual tracking and did not expect to see the disc. when the saucer came into view it was traveling at approximately 1100mph towards our position(high velocity horizontal flight) and slowed into a hover over the area before it turned and faded out of view to the west. for questions about this incident send me an email.
Summary: Nevada Disc Again Captured outside of Las Vegas by Ben Woods on July 12th at 5:45AM
